post.body: he is so cute!
LMAO
I can see the script - can't read it but can see it.
and neither are you dearest sister!
I went to fb and read the thread - hilarious! Deb is one reason why I'm addicted to fb app crack!
a Facebook web app intervention - now that is serious! She really has gone crazy b/c I get stuff from her all the time! :-)
does that include big cities in India?
I checked out the site and want to talk to you about it. Not sure what I can propose other than Sharepoint.
oops, replied to wrong thread. Still hope it does not apply to this witch! I'm cuddly warm and not ice cold :-)
hope u r not talking about this witch ;-)
It's 4:30 a.m. And I can't sleep - sigh
Paying bills this Monday - fun, fun, fun.
Going to meet some new friends at Barnes & Noble in Joliet today. Should be nice to hang out and drink some chai!
Killing time before I make dinner - chicken fajita salad, yum!
An old friend helped me to see the positive in being unemployed - an opportunity to go back to school to update some skills.
Feeling better about future. Good, positive phone calls from favorite people. Thx Michelle and Becca.
Our govenor is such an idiot! He needs to resign. Moving to NE sounds good to me or to AR.
More job hunting today. I'm hoping to be able to stay in the area b/c I really like Yorkville.
That is interesting - perhaps it is true as 2012 looms closer.
Happy Birthday to my sister!
Not too much -- just working up the motivation to write some cover letters today for jobs in Lincoln, NE
Got up at 5:30 a.m. couldn't sleep anymore so I ended up downloading free apps to my ipod touch!
It's snowing again and I am free this afternoon to go ahead and get some website updates done. (freelance work)
Just donated $10 to ACS in memory of my mom from InKnowVision.com's web site, which is one of the sites I freelance for.
I successfully leveraged php code for a photo album for the cabin website I created! And I used php for a dynamic form - woohoo!
Just finished filing for unemployment. Oh, gee, how exciting to become a statistic. I hope I get enough money to live on!
Today is the Winter Solstice so Merry Yule to All!
Made beef stew for dinner and it was very good. Perfect for a wintery day.
Well we got sleet and ice from this storm and thank goodness no power outages. Some snow yet to come.
Xmas shopping all done - finished up at Goodwill today with some nice finds! Gifts are all wrapped too.
Unemployment sucks! I'm so bored. Thank goodness for freelance work.
Hooray no insomnia last night. Almost finished with cabin web site.
